category.title: General
category.item: The Chat plugin is the main communication center in remoteCP. The plugin allows you to chat with players on the server even if youre currently not playing on that server. The plugin will use your remoteCP login name as chatname, so keep in mind that player might not recognize, who you are because you don't have that awesome(!) 1337-nickname.

category.title: How to...
category.item: Just type a message into the "Message" input-field and hit enter (or click the send-button). You may select a recipient for your message.

category.title: Filters
category.item: The filters will remove some message from the chatlisting. Filters can only changed by admin with "globalmaintenance"-permission.
Will remove all special messages like buddy-infos, message of ingame controllers like ASECO or remoteCP-Live or all messages of the remoteCP messages plugin
Will remove all chat-commands with the beginning slash, for example /severlogin
